root.description: System RequirementsMinimumOS: Windows XP SP3 (32-bit), Vista / 2 (32 or 64-bit)Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core CPUMemory: 1 GB RAMHard Disk Space: 800 MBVideo Card: GeForce 5200 or higher, Radeon 9600-Series or higherDirectX®: 9.0cSound: DirectX CompatibleRecommendedOS: Vista / 2 (32 or 64-bit)Processor: 2 Ghz Quad Core CPUMemory: 3 GB RAMHard Disk Space: 800 MBVideo Card: GeForce 8800 or higher, Radeon HD4000 series or higherDirectX®: 9.0cSound: DirectX Compatible
